thread.title: BEEVERYCREATIVE helps 3D print 5-metre tall sculpture

title: BEEVERYCREATIVE helps 3D print 5-metre tall sculpture
text:
Expand Desktop 3D printer manufacturer, BEEVERYCREATIVE , has taken part in a large-scale sculpture project for Europe’s biggest Information and Communication Technologies event, ICT (Innovate, Create, Transform). 
“3D Europa” is a sculpture designed by Leonel Moura , a Portugese artist whose works combine art with robotics, artificial intelligence and 3D printing. The work is currently being displayed in Lisbon as part of ICT 2015, a European Commission imitative organised with the Foundation for Science and Technology. 
The 5-metre tall sculpture is made up of around 300 PLA 3D printed parts and was made possible with support from BEEVERYCREATIVE and 3D Factory. Leonel used eight permanent 3D printers and help from the 3D printing community, including the BEEVERYCREATIVE team, to create the colourful piece in just six months. Tags
